short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tool providing TLDR bullet-point summaries of highlighted text

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows you to highlight text in the browser and generate a summary using a new content menu item.  This bullet point summary appears in a side panel overlay on top of the existing page.
